There is nothing more tragic than a child who feels so alone & in pain they fall victim to suicide. It is incumbent upon Congress to take action to support our children in moments of crisis.

I want to thank @AFTunion, @afspnational, @nasponline, @JasonFoundation, @NASSP, @sandyhook, and @NBJContheMove for their tireless advocacy in the effort to combat youth suicide and for endorsing my legislation.

Cady Housh and Gemesha Thomas were beloved by their family & friends and vital members of their communities. Tragically, they fell victim to suicide before reaching adulthood. 

This bill is named in their honor to assist other children who are struggling with mental health.
